titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, National Affairs Division
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, National Affairs Division FA1697

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-10-09 03:10:17 -0400.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, National Affairs Division

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by file type, program, or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at https://rockarch.org/collections/access-and-request-materials/#citations

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of office files, subject files and program files.
